original_text: The Israelites fought against the army of Sihon and they won. They got power over the land from the River Arnon to the River Jabbok. But the border of the Ammonites' land had strong towns, so they could not go beyond them.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 칼날로 그들을 쳐서 무찌르고 그 땅을 아르논에서부터 얍복까지 점령하여 암몬 자손에게까지 미치니 암몬 자손의 경계는 견고하더라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites fought against the army of Sihon
They got power over the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 땅에 대한 권세를 얻었고

sentences.original_text: from the River Arnon to the River Jabbok
But the border of the Ammonites' land
so they could not go beyond them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그곳을 지나갈 수 없었습니다
